title: Ticket #3059: DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS_LIFETIME=0 broken for Condor-C
description: If config parameter DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS_LIFETIME is set to 0, the c-gahp ends up delegating a proxy that expires January 1, 1970. This setting should result in the delegated proxy having the same expiration as the source proxy.
remarks:
2012-Jul-02 14:11:19 by jfrey:
The problem occurs when an updated proxy is forwarded for an existing job. It also affects proxy delegation between the shadow and starter.

In x509_send_delegation(), the special value of 0 for expiration_time is misinterpreted when a non-NULL value is given for result_expiration_time.
